publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-302.1 Mr Ted Brocklebank: Struan Stevenson MEP's Support for the Common Fisheries Policy-As an amendment to motion (S2M-302) in the name of Richard Lochhead, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "notes that motion S2M-302 as lodged by Richard Lochhead MSP is a total misrepresentation of the position of Struan Stevenson MEP and is based on an inaccurate newspaper article which has since been subject to correction, and considers that movers of motions should use more reliable sources before lodging motions in the Parliament.

S2M-302.1 Struan Stevenson MEP's Support for the Common Fisheries Policy (lodged on 8 September 2003) David Mundell*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Alex Johnstone*, Murdo Fraser*, John Scott*, Phil Gallie*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-302.1 Struan Stevenson MEP's Support for the Common Fisheries Policy (lodged on 8 September 2003) Alex Fergusson*, Bill Aitken*

S2M-302.1 Mr Ted Brocklebank: Struan Stevenson MEP's Support for the Common Fisheries Policyâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-302) in the name of Richard Lochhead, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "notes that motion S2M-302 as lodged by Richard Lochhead MSP is a total misrepresentation of the position of Struan Stevenson MEP and is based on an inaccurate newspaper article which has since been subject to correction, and considers that movers of motions should use more reliable sources before lodging motions in the Parliament. Supported by: David Mundell, Mrs Nanette Milne, Alex Johnstone, Murdo Fraser, John Scott, Phil Gallie, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Alex Fergusson, Bill Aitken
S2M-302.1 Struan Stevenson MEP's Support for the Common Fisheries Policy (lodged on 8 September 2003) John Swinburne*
